verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H376>either<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6381>separate<s%> themselves to <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H5139>Nazarite,<s%> to <S%H5144>separate<s%> themselves to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

He shall <S%H5144>separate<s%> himself from <S%H3196>wine<s%> and strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> and shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4952>liquor<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3892>moist<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> or <S%H3002>dried.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> shall he <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of the <S%H3196>vine<s%> tree, from the <S%H2785>kernels<s%> even to the <S%H2085>husk.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H5088>vow<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8593>razor<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> on his <S%H7218>head:<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> in the <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5144>separates<s%> himself to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he shall be <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and shall let the <S%H6545>locks<s%> of the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H1431>grow.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that he <S%H5144>separates<s%> himself to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> at <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body.<s%>

He shall not make himself <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for his <S%H1>father,<s%> or for his <S%H517>mother,<s%> for his <S%H251>brother,<s%> or for his <S%H269>sister,<s%> when they <S%H4194>die:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5145>consecration<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any man <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6621>very<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> by him, and he has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>consecration;<s%> then he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall he <S%H1548>shave<s%> it.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtles,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, for that he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> and shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5144>consecrate<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering: but the <S%H3117>days<s%> that were <S%H7223>before<s%> shall be <S%H5307>lost,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H5145>separation<s%> was <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazarite,<s%> when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled:<s%> he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> he <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3535>ewe<s%> <S%H3535>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings,

And a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread, <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7550>wafers<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and their meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering:

And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread: the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> also his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and his <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering.

And the <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1311>sodden<s%> <S%H2220>shoulder<s%> of the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazarite,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the hair of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> is <S%H1548>shaven:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> with the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> and of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> that that his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5381>get:<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H5088>vow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he must <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> On <S%H3541>this<s%> wise you shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to them,
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> you:
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> make his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H215>shine<s%> on you, and be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to you:
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up his <S%H6440>countenance<s%> on you, and <S%H7760>give<s%> you <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
And they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them.
